trans-unit.source: Provides a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> for a tab control that shares its bottom border with another tab control.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Tab.TopTabItemBothEdges.Normal%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Tab.TopTabItemBothEdges> class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> that represents a tab control that shares its bottom border with another tab control.
Gets a visual style element that represents a tab control that shares its bottom border with another tab control.

You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Tab.TopTabItemBothEdges.Normal%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> that represents a tab control that shares its bottom border with another tab control.
